message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. I think it would be a great fit for your needs and I'm confident it will bring you a lot of value. I'm asking for $20,000 to start negotiations. What do you think?
Alice, that's a bit high for me. I'm interested in the product, but my budget is closer to $13,000. Would you be willing to come down a bit?

Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your budget constraints, but $20,000 is closer to my asking price for this product.  It offers significant value that I'm sure you'll appreciate.  How about we meet in the middle at $17,000?

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $17,000 is still a bit out of my range.  I'm willing to go up to $14,000.  This would be a fair price for both of us, and I'm confident I'll get good value from the product.
